biography.value:
When the demon lord Yeenoghu wants to create a particularly fearsome war band leader, he transforms an exceptionally strong and vicious gnoll into a demonic warrior known as a flind.

A war band of demon-worshiping gnolls typically contains only one flind, and that creature sets the war band’s path. Because of its special connection to Yeenoghu, a flind uses demonic insight to guide the gnolls toward weak prey ripe for slaughter.

Unlike other leaders who might skulk behind their minions, a flind leads the charge in battle. Its flail causes wracking pain, paralysis, and disorientation in those it strikes.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse
Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value: This armor consists of a fitted metal chest piece worn with supple leather. Although it leaves the legs and arms relatively unprotected, this armor provides good protection for the wearer's vital organs while leaving the wearer relatively unencumbered.

The flind makes one Flail of Chaos attack, one Flail of Pain attack, and one Flail of Paralysis attack, or it makes three Longbow attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d10 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage, and the target must make a [[/save wis 16 format=long]]. On a failed save, the target must use its reaction, if available, to make one melee attack against a random creature, other than the flind, within its reach. If there’s no creature within reach, the target instead moves half its speed in a random direction.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d10 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 3d10 type=psychic average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d10 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage, and the target must succeed on a [[/save con 16 format=long]] or be &Reference[paralyzed]{paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d8 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Aura of Blood Thirst. If the flind isn’t &Reference[incapacitated]{incapacitated}, any creature that has Rampage can make a Bite attack as a bonus action while within 10 feet of the flind.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse
